nodes.text: In 8 ABY, Moff Kentor Sarne deployed a Carrack-class light cruiser to Tanquilla Beach. The captain's mission was to strike at the corvette FarStar and then retreat into hyperspace. Unfortunately, Sarne was unaware of the extent of Tanquilla Beach's armaments, and the Carrack was destroyed when faced with the Beach's defenses and the FarStar.
